common.description: Configure global information about the physical clock.

system-clock-run-mode.description: Running mode of a system clock.

ssm-control-on.description: Enable/disable the SSM level to participate in clock source selection.

ext-ssm-control-on.description: Enable/disable the extended SSM level participates in clock source selection.

enh-ssm-control-on.description: Enable/disable the enhanced SSM level to participate in clock source selection.

internal-clock-id.description: Clock ID of an internal clock source used for extended SSM control.

internal-clock-ssm.description: Configure the SSM level of the internal clock source.

ssm-recovery-mode.description: Configure SSM recovery mode as revertive mode or non-revertive mode.

wtr-time.description: WTR time for a Down interface.

freq-switch-enable.description: Enable/disable frequency offset switchover. After switchover triggered by frequency offset is enabled, signals are switched to another slave source on the same interface board if the frequency offset is detected abnormal.

holdoff-time.description: Holdoff time of the clock source after an interface changes from normal to abnormal.

ssm-unk-map.description: Map UNK to an SSM level so that the clock source with the unknown SSM level can be selected.

min-out-ssm-bits.description: Lowest SSM level of the clock signals output by the BITS interface.

max-out-ssm-system.description: Highest SSM level of the output system clock signals. If the SSM level of a system clock is greater than the set highest SSM level, the system clock signals are output based on the highest SSM level.

max-out-ssm-2m1.description: Highest SSM level of the output 2M-1 clock signals. If the SSM level of a 2M-1 clock is greater than the set highest SSM level, the 2M-1 clock signals are output based on the highest SSM level.

max-out-ssm-2m2.description: Highest SSM level of the output 2M-2 clock signals. If the SSM level of a 2M-2 clock is greater than the set highest SSM level, the 2M-2 clock signals are output based on the highest SSM level.

freq-offset-alarm-threshold.description: Alarm threshold for physical layer frequency offset.

device-clk-level.description: The Clock Level of the current device.

selection-sources.description: List of configure physical layer clock source selection.

selection.description: Configure physical layer clock source selection.

source-name.description: Name of the selected clock source in forced clock source selection and manual clock source selection.

mode.description: Clock source selection mode: forced clock source selection, manual clock source selection, and automatic clock source selection.

trace-source-name.description: Name of the traced clock source.

external-clock-sources.description: List of configure physical layer clock source.

name.description: Name of the physical clock source.

state.description: Status of a physical clock source.

sync-enable.description: Enable/disable clock synchronization for the physical clock source.

reference-enable.description: Whether a clock source can serve as a reference clock source.

phy-state.description: Physical status of the clock source.

system-priority.description: Priority of the physical source. In physical clock source selection, you must configure the priority of clock sources for the system PLL. Otherwise, the clock sources cannot participate in the selection of the system PLL clock source.

ssm-class.description: Configure information about the SSM level, including SSM selection mode, input SSM level, and output SSM level.

ssm-configured.description: Input SSM level of the physical clock source. If clock sources are configured with SSM levels, the configured SSM levels are used.

ssm-learn.description: Input SSM level of the physical clock source. If clock sources are configured with SSM levels, the configured SSM levels are used.

ssm-output.description: Output SSM level of the physical clock source.

clock-id.description: Configure information about the Clock ID of extended SSM control, including the clock ID selection mode, input clock ID, and output clock ID.

clock-id-configured.description: Clock ID of the physical clock source in extended SSM control.

clock-id-learn.description: Clock ID of the physical clock source in extended SSM control.

clock-id-out.description: Output Clock ID of the physical clock source in extended SSM control.

sabit.description: Sa timeslot used by the BITS interface to send or receive the SSM level.

force-cutoff-enable.description: Enable/disable forcible cutoff for external clock output.

detections.description: List of statistics of physical clock source detection.

detection.description: Statistics of physical clock source detection.

freq-value.description: Detected frequency offset value of the clock source.
